select oil.date,oil.oilMoney,ro.notoilMoney,wea.avgWater from ( SELECT sum(oilMoney) oilMoney,DATE_FORMAT(minutes, '%Y-%m-%d') date FROM res_oil where DATE_FORMAT(minutes, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(minutes, '%Y-%m-%d') )oil LEFT JOIN( SELECT SUM(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,DATE_FORMAT(minutes, '%Y-%m-%d') date from res_notoil where DATE_FORMAT(minutes, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(minutes, '%Y-%m-%d') )ro on oil.date=ro.date left JOIN( SELECT avgWater,date from weather where date>=DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 day)
)wea on ro.date =wea.date

select oils name,sum(oilMoney) value from res_oil
where minutes>=DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 day)
group by oils

select departmentName name,sum(departmentMoney) value from res_notoilDepartment
where minutes>=DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 day)
group by departmentName
select DISTINCT departmentName from res_notoilDepartment UNION select DISTINCT oils from res_oil

where time>=DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 30 day)
